<!-- 
This block contains all the custom CSS for styling the page.
-->
<style>
/* Font Import */
@import url('[https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Assistant:wght@200..800&display=swap](https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Assistant:wght@200..800&display=swap)');

/* General Styling */
body {
  font-family: 'Assistant', sans-serif;
  color: rgb(55, 58, 60);
  line-height: 1.6;
}

/* NAVBAR ALIGNMENT FIX */
/* This rule overrides Quarto's centering of the "Home" link */
.navbar-brand-container.mx-auto {
  margin-left: 0 !important;
  margin-right: auto !important; /* This pushes other navbar items to the right */
}

/* This rule sets the max-width for the navbar's content */
.navbar .container-fluid {
  max-width: 1262.96px;
}

/* This is the main content container for the page */
.container-fluid {
  max-width: 1262.96px; 
  margin-left: auto;
  margin-right: auto;
  padding-left: 5px;
  padding-right: 5px;
  padding-top: 5px;
}

/* Section Styling */
.section {
  padding: 20px 0;
  border-bottom: 1px solid #eee;
}
.section:last-child {
  border-bottom: none;
}

h2.section-title {
  text-align: center;
  font-size: 2em;
  margin-bottom: 40px;
  font-weight: 700;
  position: relative;
}

/* Story Section */
.story-container {
  max-width: 800px;
  margin: 0 auto;
  text-align: center;
  font-size: 1.1em;
}
.story-container p {
  margin-bottom: 1em; /* Ensure paragraphs have spacing */
}

/* PhD Project Showcase */
.phd-grid {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: 1fr;
  gap: 30px;
  align-items: stretch;
}

.phd-card {
  background: #fff;
  border-radius: 10px;
  padding: 25px;
  box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(0,0,0,0.08);
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
}
.phd-card.full-width {
  grid-column: 1 / -1;
  text-align: center;
}
.phd-card h3 {
  font-size: 1.5em;
  color: #005a9c;
  margin-bottom: 15px;
  text-align: center;
}
.phd-card p, .phd-card ul {
  font-size: 1.0em;
  margin-bottom: 0;
}
.supervisor-list {
  list-style: none;
  padding: 0;
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(200px, 1fr));
  gap: 20px;
}
.supervisor-list li {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  text-align: center;
  margin-bottom: 25px;
}
.supervisor-list img {
  width: 80px;
  height: 80px;
  border-radius: 50%;
  margin-bottom: 10px;
  object-fit: cover;
}
.supervisor-name {
  font-weight: bold;
}
.supervisor-title {
  font-size: 0.9em;
  color: #666;
}

/* Download Button Styling */
.btn-download {
  display: inline-block;
  padding: 12px 25px;
  font-size: 1.1em;
  font-weight: bold;
  color: #fff;
  background-color: #005a9c;
  border-radius: 8px;
  text-decoration: none;
  transition: background-color 0.3s, transform 0.3s;
}
.btn-download:hover {
  background-color: #004a80;
  transform: translateY(-2px);
  color: #fff;
}
.btn-download i {
  margin-right: 10px;
}

/* Small button variant for the story section */
.story-container .btn-download {
  font-size: 0.95em;
  padding: 8px 18px;
  margin-top: 20px;
}

/* Experience Section - NEW Minimalist Style */
.experience-list {
  max-width: 700px;
  margin: 0 auto;
  text-align: center;
}
.experience-item {
  margin-bottom: 35px;
}
.experience-item h3 {
  margin-top: 0;
  color: #005a9c;
  font-size: 1.4em;
  margin-bottom: 5px;
}
.experience-item .date {
  font-weight: bold;
  color: #555;
  margin-bottom: 8px;
  font-size: 1em;
}
.experience-item p {
  margin-bottom: 0;
  font-size: 1em;
  color: #444;
}


</style>
